name: Dead on Arrival (kags)
description:
In distant space, an unnamed astronaut wakes up in a spaceship. Confused about his existence, his only companion is an artificial intelligence that also claims to be alive. Wandering through the infinity of space in search of a meaning for life while trying to discover the meaning of your state is your only option, having to fight against your self, your yearnings and regrets. A passionate science fiction story, driven by drama and fear.
